attribute.description: Configure attribute of a PCE client.

association-type-enable.description: Enable/disable New Association based on IETF.

hold-time.description: Time to declare PCE session dead.

keepalive-time.description: Time to send Keepalive messages on active PCE sessions.

delegate-hold-time.description:
LSP delegate timer sets the LSP delegate keep
time when the connection with server is break or when the higher preference server session is Up.

state-timeout-time.description: Time to declare PCE learnt LSP state as invalid.

connect-servers.description: List of connect-servers of a PCE client.

connect-server.description: Configure connect-server of a PCE client.

pce-initiated-lsp-number.description: Configure alarm threshold for PCEP-initiated LSPs.

lsps.description: List of PCE LSP information on client.

lsp.description: Operational data of PCE LSP information on client.

sessions.description: List of PCE session information on client.

session.description: Operational data of PCE session information on client.

ip-address.description: IP address of a PCE session.

peer-hold-time.description: Hold time of PCE sessions on peer.

peer-keepalive-time.description: Keepalive time of PCE sessions on peer.

lsp-update-recv-count.description: Number of LSP update messages received.

lsp-update-sent-count.description: Number of LSP update messages sent.

lsp-report-recv-count.description: Number of LSP report messages received.

lsp-report-sent-count.description: Number of LSP report messages sent.

lsp-init-recv-count.description: Number of LSP initiate messages received.

lsp-init-sent-count.description: Number of LSP initiate messages sent.

pce-error-msg-recv-count.description: Number of path computation error messages received.

pce-error-msg-sent-count.description: Number of path computation error messages sent.

unknown-msg-req-recv-count.description: Number of unknown request messages received.

path-request-timeout-count.description: Number of path computation request timeouts.

path-compute-req-msg-recv-count.description: Number of path computation request messages received.

path-compute-req-msg-sent-count.description: Number of path computation request messages sent.

path-compute-reply-msg-recv-count.description: Number of path computation reply messages received.

path-compute-reply-msg-sent-count.description: Number of path computation reply messages sent.

capability.description: Operational data of PCE session capability.

stitch-label.description: Stitch label capability of PCE session.

segment-routing.description: Segmant routing capability of PCE session.

pce-initiated-lsp.description: PCE initiated LSP capability of PCE session.

srv6-te-policy-cpaths.description: List of SRv6 TE Policy candidate paths.

srv6-te-policy-cpath.description: Operational state of SRv6 TE Policy candidate path.

segment-list.description: Operational state of segment list information.
